Play Field Draw Sv¶

class reamber.algorithms.analysis.playField.parts.PFDrawSv.PFDrawSv(decimalPlaces: int = 2, color: str = '#4ef279', xOffset: int = 0, yOffset: int = 0)¶

Bases: reamber.algorithms.analysis.playField.parts.PFDrawable.PFDrawable

__init__(decimalPlaces: int = 2, color: str = '#4ef279', xOffset: int = 0, yOffset: int = 0)¶

Draws Svs on the field, only works with maps that have svs :param decimalPlaces: The number of decimal places to display :param color: The color of the text :param xOffset: Padding from the right, useful if you have multiple text drawables overlapping :param yOffset: The offset to move the text

draw(pf: PlayField) → PlayField¶

Refer to __init__
